definition: light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. to 輕軌|轻轨[qing1 gui3]
pinyin: qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1

sentences.english: The technical requirements to light conveyor and processing belts are manifold.
sentences.chinese: 轻型输送带和加工安全带的技术要求是多方面的。

sentences.english: One trainee persuaded a farmer to lend him his light truck, so he could get cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 有一位受训者试图向一位农民借他的轻型卡车去买烟。

sentences.english: These small arms and light weapons also pose another threat.
sentences.chinese: 这些小型和轻型武器还构成另一种威胁。

sentences.english: Next month they plan to stage a body burning in a light aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 下个月他们还将在一架轻型飞机上做尸体燃烧试验。

sentences.english: Light ship-of-the-line has around fifty heavy cannons on two decks.
sentences.chinese: 轻型战列舰在两层甲板上有大约50门中型加农炮。

sentences.english: This article is concerning the lightweight microwave absorbing coating containing carbonyl iron powder(CIP).
sentences.chinese: 研究了以羰基铁粉为吸收剂的吸波涂层的轻型化问题。

sentences.english: BYD also makes small gasoline-powered cars and is having no trouble selling them.
sentences.chinese: 比亚迪也制造轻型小排量汽车，销售相当顺利。

sentences.english: The anti-tank rifleman is able to attack vehicles and destroy them with a light anti-armor weapon.
sentences.chinese: 反坦克兵可以使用轻型反坦克武器攻击并摧毁载具。

sentences.english: Ultra-light construction makes for easy hauling.
Represents all aspects of non-powered ultralight flight.
sentences.chinese: 代表所有非动力超轻型飞机。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a light H-section steel, which belongs to the technical field of materials for buildings.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型一种轻型H型钢，属于建筑用材技术领域。

sentences.english: Employs the commander machinegun for close-in defense of the tank or fire against light targets at other ranges.
sentences.chinese: 进行近程防御，使用车长机枪攻击轻型目标或步兵。

sentences.english: A fuze delay allows penetration of dense woods and light earthworks.
sentences.chinese: 用于炮弹穿透浓密的林木和轻型土木工事。

sentences.english: The van began to rush down the hill towards the traffic circle.
sentences.chinese: 这辆轻型货车开始从山上冲下来，冲向交通圈。

sentences.english: In the US market technically you do not require a license to fly an Ultralight.
sentences.chinese: 在美国市场的技术不需要许可证的超轻型飞行。

sentences.english: Pitti exhibitors freshen up with subtle colors, lighter construction and elevated luxe .
sentences.chinese: 淡淡的颜色，轻型结构和高品质奢侈让。
